answers.answer: What is your age?  Do you have diabetes? Do you take this for high blood pressure?  What is your normal heart rate?  A lot of factors go into determining whether to drink alcohol with this drug or not ... ask your doctor.  People whose heart rates are low generally should not drink alcohol with Bystolic.

question: Is it safe to continue to enjoy my red wine before bed time while I am on Bystolic 5 mg?
title: Bystolic and Red Wine ~
